body_html: Just wanted to give an update since others have asked about this as well: We've tried a number of different combinations of alwayslink, linkstatic, and linkshared, but nothing has fixed this issue. I think we will need to restructure the Bazel targets to get finer-grained control of the binary or library options during build. I won't be able to look into this soon, but if anyone wants to use the MPI collectives in the meantime, we recommend building a TF mainline commit before 5c7f9e3
